setup_script_description: expands the combobox, and places focus on the first option in the listbox popup
task: read information about a listbox popup
specific_user_instruction: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, read information about the listbox popup.
output_assertions: Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('States') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Alabama') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (1) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (56) is conveyed
